Title: Job Killing Robot Or...
Description:
I shouldn't have set ELIZA to simply gather as much food as she could. She was working, but when a wagon came by, full of food for Mereldar, she started chasing it! And she wouldn't let me access her decision sprockets or tensor springs!

I kept trying, but ELIZA wouldn't stop. Eventually, she outran me. $p, I need you to stop her before someone gets killed.
PortraitGiverText: Orren's machine is out of control, and needs to be stopped.
CompletionText: Were you able to stop ELIZA?
RewardText:
ELIZA didn't work like I expected. But Aemyra believes I'll get it right... I'm going to keep trying. 

And when I do, lack of food won't be a threat to the Arathi--and lack of time won't keep me from Aemyra!
